hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdur-Rahman bin ‘Awf that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The one who fasts Ramadan while traveling is like one who breaks his fast when not traveling.” Abu Ishaq said: "This Hadith is of no significance

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الإِفْطَارِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning not fasting while traveling
